rooms.description: You are in classroom 106, it is empty, you see a cookie on the desk.

rooms.name: G12CA
rooms.description: You are in the Grade 12 Common Area.
rooms.dialogue: James: Hey! Can you help me find my ping pong ball? I lost it but I still want to play another match!
rooms.completionStatement: Alan: Hello friend. Today, you have endured a treacherous journey, all in the name of finding a pingpong ball for a James Simmons. The lesson you have yet to learn is that the true essence of this quest lies not in the ping pong ball itself, the real ping pong ball is the friends we made along the way.

rooms.name: ArtRoom
rooms.description: You are in the Art Room.
rooms.dialogue: Yolanda: Hi! Could you help me find the purple paint?
rooms.completionStatement: Yolanda: Thank you so much!! I'll show you my painting when I'm done!

rooms.name: ChemLab
rooms.description: You are in the Chem Lab.
rooms.dialogue: Ms. Lee: AHH FIRE! I was experimenting with potassium and water and the chemical reaction got a bit out of hand...
rooms.completionStatement: Ms. Lee: Thank you so much for extinguishing the fire! Good luck with your Functions Exam

rooms.name: Hallway1
rooms.description: You are in the Hallway.

rooms.name: Gym
rooms.description: You are in the Gym.
rooms.dialogue: Ms. Deeks: Hey! I just finished coaching Sr Frisbee, could you lend me a hand and help put the nets up?
rooms.completionStatement: Ms. Deeks: Thanks so much for you help! Oh, I heard that there was a ping pong ball in the cafeteria, bit odd but maybe worth checking out

rooms.dialogue: Rohan: Hi uh so I might've forgotten my lunch card at home... could I borrow yours?
rooms.completionStatement: Rohan: Thanks!! I'll pay you back next time!

rooms.name: FitnessRoom
rooms.description: You are in the Fitness Room.
rooms.dialogue: Thomas: Can you my dumbbell bench press? I'm trying to hit a new PR.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: You are in the Library. There is a black book lying on the corner table.

rooms.name: AlumniHall
rooms.description: You are in the Alumni Hall. A grey piece of fabric sits beside the potted plant.

rooms.name: RestRoom2
rooms.description: You are in the Rest Room. Weirdo. There is a small white card in the sink.

rooms.name: MusicRoom
rooms.description: You are in the Music Room.
rooms.dialogue: Krrisha: Hey! I left my book in the library, could you grab it for me? Don't lose youself in the halls... :)
rooms.completionStatement: Krrisha: Thank you so so much. Be careful out there..

rooms.dialogue: Vanessa: Hey! Could you find me a rag? I want to polish my DECA Glass.
